abstract: Habib Mohamed Bellaïd (born 28 March 1986) is an Algerian footballer who plays for Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 side MC Alger as a centre back.An Algerian international, Bellaïd was part of the Algeria squad at the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa. As of June 2013, he has one cap.
